attributes.action: For Grate Britain to stay out of Nato's proxy war with Russia.
attributes.additional_details: Because the peoples word is the final word. A LTD company i.e (Government LTD) Have no rights to ignore the citizens they serve.
attributes.background: The government are servants to the people, Not the people to the government. We the people and all who have signed this petition Do not want to get involved with Nato (Americas) proxy war against Russia

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632957

You may also be interested to know that the UK Government is not a limited company.

You also appear to have started your petition using a fake name, and we can only accept petitions where some provides a full, correct name.
